Question: What message or moral lesson does the poem convey?
Option1: Friendship is more important than adventure
Option2: It is better to stay at home than embark on risky journeys
Option3: Cooperation and compromise are essential in relationships
Option4: Animals should not attempt to imitate each other
CorrectOption: Cooperation and compromise are essential in relationships
